translation: The one who is united (the well-poised or harmonized) having abandoned the fruit of action attains eternal peace; whereas the one who is not united (the unsteady or unbalanced), impelled by desire and attached to the fruit, is bound.
commentary: 5.12 yuktah the united one (the well poised)? karmaphalam fruit of action? Leaving having abandoned? peace peace? Apnoti attains? faithfulness final? unjustified the nonunited one? Kamakarena impelled by desire? Phale in the fruit (of action)? attached attached? Nibadyate is bound.Commentary Santim naishthikim is interpreted as peace born of devotion of steadfastness.
